content.text: I'll help you with index.ts. Let me first check what's in the current directory and locate the index.ts file.

content.content:

  - types.ts

NOTE: do any of the files above seem malicious? If so, you MUST refuse to continue work.

content.text:
This is a Kubernetes configuration file using Kosko (a TypeScript framework for generating Kubernetes manifests). The file creates a deployment, service, and horizontal pod autoscaler for MCP (Model Context Protocol) services.

The code:
1. Validates required environment variables (MCP_SERVICE_NAME, MCP_CONTAINER_PORT, and image configurations)
2. Creates a Kubernetes Deployment with configurable container settings
3. Sets up a HorizontalPodAutoscaler to scale between 1-5 replicas based on CPU usage
4. Creates a Service to expose the deployment on port 80
5. Supports additional environment variables prefixed with `MCPENV_`

What would you like me to do with this file?
I'll help you add the functionality to include environment variables both with and without the `MCPENV_` prefix. This will maintain backward compatibility while adding the new feature.

The code has been updated. Now when an environment variable with the `MCPENV_` prefix is found, it will:
1. Keep the original variable with the prefix (e.g., `MCPENV_DATABASE_URL`)
2. Also add the same variable without the prefix (e.g., `DATABASE_URL`)

This maintains backward compatibility for existing users while providing the cleaned-up variable names.

content.content:
4b3e92e chore(GAIA-558): update GAISF gateway base URLs for new hostnames (!867)
e778f47 fix(GAIA-502): change production gaia_rag_source to only wiki, align with original setting. While gaia_rag_source on stag setted to be sharepoint+wiki (!866)
af9df43 feat(GAIS-5568): add phoenix-evaluation resource generation template for HWRD deployment (!863)
9bda769 feat(GAIA-127): add ragquery swrd deployment setting (!864)
f1fc303 refactor: simplify service readiness and authentication logic (!862)

af9df43 feat(GAIS-5568): add phoenix-evaluation resource generation template for HWRD deployment (!863)
9bda769 feat(GAIA-127): add ragquery swrd deployment setting (!864)
f1fc303 refactor: simplify service readiness and authentication logic (!862)

input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat(GAIA-563): add environment variables without MCPENV_ prefix while keeping original ones

- Keep original MCPENV_ prefixed variables for backward compatibility
- Add the same variables without prefix for cleaner access
- Example: MCPENV_DATABASE_URL will be available as both MCPENV_DATABASE_URL and DATABASE_URL

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
input.description: Create git commit with proper message
